mil7.5.5:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘nakulassa ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.5.5:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, nakulo uragamupagacchanto bhesajjena kayam paribhavetva uragamupagacchati gahetum;
mil7.5.5:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena kodhaghatabahulam kalahaviggahavivadavirodhabhibhutam lokamupagacchantena mettabhesajjena manasam anulimpitabbam.
mil7.5.5:1.4: Idam, maharaja, nakulassa ekam angam gahetabbam.
